formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of wsadmin, including filename and extension. If the path in which wsadmin is stored in the path environmental variable, the absolute path is ommited. i.e: '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the application to undeploy. i.e: 'webapp'.

formElement.label: Commands:
formElement.documentation: Commands to be entered to wsadmin. Use one command per line.

formElement.label: Java Parameters:
formElement.documentation: Java options to be passed to wsadmin, separate them using semicolons (;).

formElement.label: Classpath:
formElement.documentation: Jars to be passed to the wsadmin classpath. It is a string containing paths (semicolon-separated) the required JARs to execute wsadmin in a particular job. i.e: 'c:/MyDir/Myjar.jar;d:/yourdir/yourdir.jar' or '/MyDir/Myjar.jar;/yourdir/yourdir.jar'

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for wsadmin.
